settings.heading: Chef Chad White x Spiceology
settings.content: From opening a ceviche bar in a landlocked city to having a lobster roll restaurant in a skywalk, Chef Chad White is known for breaking the mold. And he’s putting his signature style into his new BBQ blends by carving out a space for something new… Pacific Northwest Que… that’s right, everyone knows Carolina, Kansas City, etc. when it comes to BBQ, but, ladies and gentlemen, meet PNWQ.

settings.heading: About Chef Chad White
settings.text:
You might recognize Chef Chad White from Bravo’s Top Chef Season 13, but there’s a lot more to this Spokane native. After cooking in the Navy and then under award-winning chefs in San Diego, White triumphantly returned to Spokane where he opened up a handful of restaurants.

At his Zona Blanca Ceviche Bar, he has received the Best New Restaurant and Chef of the Year awards for 3 years running. In 2020, Chad also received a semi-finalist nomination for a James Beard “Best Chef” – Northwest Region Award. Follow him over at @ChefChadWhite.
